parameters.name: GlobalAccelerationInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the shared-bandwidth instance.

parameters.name: IpInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the EIP.

To query the EIP ID, call DescribeEipAddresses.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the shared-bandwidth instance is located.

To query the region ID, call DescribeRegions.
